Hydras:

"Tylrael's building a gun that rip apart Unicron..."said Hydras "Or 
at last that's he belive... but will be necesary to have an extra 
way to defeat him incase that this gun didn't fuction"

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> AzureBlade frowned.
>

> but after, be grateful if I do not rip you apart.
> 
> He transformed to robot mode and looked at Hydras in the optics.
> 
> AzureBlade: Now, what are your plans?

to
